articles.title: Woolworths opens new Food Emporium in Cape Town
articles.summary: Woolworths has launched its new Food Emporium in Durbanville, Cape Town, featuring various new offerings. These include a florist counter, a revamped premium food counter called 'Our Kitchen', an expanded seafood selection, a new butcher counter with wagyu, a bakery with artisanal breads, an elevated pantry experience, and a confectionery alcove.

articles.title: 41 Products That Are Shockingly Clever
articles.author: Amanda Davis
articles.summary: This selection of products includes a RobeCurls heatless hair curler, designed for achieving curls without heat damage; a "Magic Tap" automatic drink dispenser to prevent spills; and a trio pan for cooking three different dishes simultaneously, catering to varied dietary needs. Other products include a wireless remote control outlet plug to control electronic appliances and a set of refillable paint touch-up pens to conceal small nicks and chips.

articles.title: 27 ModCloth Dresses You'll Never Stop Wearing
articles.author: Kit Stone
articles.summary: The article describes several new dress styles, including a baby doll dress with smock panel and pockets for $79.99, a cuffed-sleeve dress with flower buttons for $79.99, and a tulle polka-dot dress with butterfly spaghetti straps for $79.99. Other new styles include a high-low lacy dress ($29.99), a glittery midi dress ($79.60), a linen blend midi dress ($86.60) and many more, each with unique patterns and features.

articles.title: Why Custom Writing Mockups Are FAR Better Than Writing Samples
articles.summary: The article describes how freelance writers can create custom writing mockups tailored to specific companies to showcase their ability to write product descriptions, social media blurbs, and other content. For example, a mockup description was written for "Willow & Wisp" and their Lavender Fog candle, demonstrating the writer's understanding of the product.

articles.title: The  Best Early Prime Day Deals Available Now According To Our Deal Experts
articles.author: Jordan Thomas
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 early deals have begun, offering discounts on various products. Some companies are offering significant discounts, like Philips Sonicare ExpertClean 7500 Electric Toothbrush (50% off), Garmin Vívoactive 5 smartwatch (35% off) and Lenovo 15.6-Inch FHD laptop (33% off). The sale includes items from various brands such as Apple, Dyson, Samsung, and more, spanning electronics, home goods, and personal care items.

articles.title: Niu Technologies Provides Second Quarter 2025 Sales Volume Update
articles.author: NIU Technologies
articles.summary: NIU Technologies launched a comprehensive portfolio of electric motorcycles, including off-road models, in the international markets during the second quarter of 2025. This launch, supported by an expanded distribution network, aimed to strengthen NIU's global market position. In China, NIU focused on enhancing existing models and refining their product portfolio, resulting in optimized product mix.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a 'tiny' $250 2TB external hard drive for $135, and shoppers say it's 'amazingly fast'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Crucial X10 Portable SSD at a discounted price. The SSD provides users with additional storage space for laptops, allowing them to store various files like photos and videos.

articles.title: Local 5 Top Stories: Week of June 29
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers a streaming service accessible through the WeAreIowa app on mobile phones.

articles.title: Samsung rolls out One UI 8 Beta 3 with powerful AI tricks for Galaxy S25 users
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: Samsung is internally testing early software for its next Galaxy S series phone, likely to be called the Galaxy S25. Testers are experiencing major improvements in device performance during everyday use, indicating a refined and smoother phone experience overall. This shows Samsung's commitment to finalizing the software and addressing user feedback.

articles.title: How ChatGPT got its name: The ‘late-night discussion' and what it means
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT in late 2022 after simplifying its original name 'Chat with GPT-3.5' due to pronunciation difficulties. The key differentiators from its predecessors were a more user-friendly interface and a memorable name which quickly attracted millions of users worldwide after its launch.

articles.title: Ndlovukazi Rises: OMODA and Khosi Nkosi reunite for the C7 unveiling at Hollywoodbets Durban July
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: OMODA debuted its new C7 model at the Hollywoodbets Durban July, showcasing it with a unique wrap designed in collaboration with Khosi Nkosi. The C7, positioned between the C5 X Series and C9, offers both a 1.6-litre turbocharged petrol engine and a plug-in hybrid option with a 105 km all-electric range and is equipped with features like power-adjustable, heated, and ventilated front seats and an advanced driver assistance suite.

articles.title: Amazon's £27 window vacuum that 'doesn't leave streaks' with 'great suction'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon is promoting the Window Vacuum Cleaner Set with Telescopic Handle, which features strong suction and a telescopic pole for easy window cleaning and is on sale for \u00a327.43. Currys is also offering the KARCHER WV 6 Plus Window Vacuum Cleaner at a discounted price of \u00a379.99, boasting up to 100 minutes of battery life for cleaning tiles and glass.

articles.title: SA gushes over high‑end Woolies in Durbanville, Cape Town
articles.author: Gloria Masia
articles.summary: Woolworths launched its first Food Emporium at Village Square on July 2, 2025, featuring high-end amenities like pet-friendly zones and chef-led sections. The store aims to offer a premium grocery experience, combining luxury with value, and targeting shoppers seeking fresh and varied products.

articles.title: First look at US chicken chain's new Co Antrim location
articles.author: Garrett Hargan
articles.summary: Popeyes is opening a new restaurant at The Junction on July 7th, offering both sit-in and takeaway options, including their first drive-thru in Northern Ireland. The restaurant's menu includes items like chicken sandwiches, hot wings, and Cajun rice. The restaurant will be open from 8 AM to 10 PM, seven days a week.

articles.title: How Karnataka's iconic Mysore Sandal Soap overshot targets, clocked highest ever sales
articles.summary: Karnataka Soaps & Detergents Ltd (KS&DL) is investing Rs 250 crore in a new plant at Vijayapura in north Karnataka and also eyeing diversification into new products. The company aims for a national and international presence in the future.

articles.title: I tested AI writing tools on iPhone vs Galaxy vs Pixel — here's the winner
articles.author: Philip Michaels
articles.summary: Apple, Google, and Samsung are focusing on AI writing tools within their devices. Apple Intelligence, Gemini AI (on Pixel devices), and Galaxy AI were tested on their abilities to adjust writing tone, improve professionalism, format notes, and proofread. Samsung's Galaxy AI was particularly strong in enhancing notes, while Google's Gemini AI performed well overall, and Apple Intelligence showed potential in tone adjustment.

articles.title: Prime Day 2025: When it ends, best early Prime Day deals for Michigan shoppers
articles.author: Lianna Norman
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 will run for four days, from July 8 through July 11, offering deals across various categories for Amazon Prime members. Early Prime Day deals are already available on select items like kitchen appliances, tools, and electronics, with official deals starting on July 8. A new Prime membership option for 18 to 24-year-olds and discounts for customers who qualify for government assistance are introduced.

articles.title: Virgin Media is giving shoppers a free TV worth over £200 in one-week only deal
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering new customers a free 50" Hisense Smart TV or a £200 bill credit when they sign up for select TV and broadband bundles. These bundles include options with varying broadband speeds, Sky Cinema, Sky Sports, and Netflix, catering to different customer needs and preferences.

articles.title: 108 best early Prime Day deals you can shop right now on Amazon Canada — up to 88% off tech, kitchen and more
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Amazon Canada has released early Prime Day deals, offering discounts on various products from brands like Samsung, Sony, LG, Hisense, ASUS, Levi's, Philips Sonicare, Waterpik, Shark, Dyson, Bissell, iRobot, Tineco, Eufy, Greenworks, Apple, Ring, Nespresso, Garmin, Ninja, JBL, Keurig, DEWALT, Samsung, TCL, Fitbit, Breville and many more. Discounts reach up to 88% off on selected items during the Prime Day sales event.

articles.title: SaaS Is Dead. Long Live Service-As-A-Service
articles.author: Alexander Puutio
articles.summary: Amplitude has launched AI agents, moving beyond product data interpretation to offering growth recommendations and A/B test implementation. ElevenLabs began cloning voices and is now providing brand voices-as-a-service, marking the evolution of service offerings. Zendesk is also selling 'automated customer service' with AI resolving tickets end-to-end.

articles.title: First look at top-secret Samsung phone that folds THREE times with giant screen after ‘leak' days before big reveal
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Samsung may be launching a new "multifold" phone, potentially named "Galaxy G Fold" or "Multifold 7", featuring a three-panelled design with a dual-hinge folding mechanism and a triple-camera setup. The phone's design was inadvertently exposed in an update to the One UI 8 software, and it is expected to be revealed at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9th alongside other foldable phones like the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7.

articles.title: First look at top-secret Samsung phone that folds THREE times with giant screen after ‘leak' days before big reveal
articles.author: Millie Turner
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to unveil a new "multifold" phone, potentially named 'Galaxy G Fold' or 'Multifold 7', at its upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9th. The phone features a three-panelled design with a dual-hinge folding mechanism, a triple-camera setup, and a cover display with a front-facing camera.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 leaked in hands-on images ahead of Unpacked Event 2025: What ...
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Leaked hands-on images of Samsung's upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7 have surfaced before its official unveiling. This suggests the imminent introduction of the new foldable smartphone.

articles.title: Walkers fans face major Quavers update for the first time in 'years'
articles.author: Hannah Ahmed
articles.summary: Walkers has launched a new flavor of Quavers, Red Leicester, for the first time in three years. This new flavor joins the existing Quavers range and is described as a bold, tangy, and irresistibly moreish upgrade to the iconic cheesy snack.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day LIVE: The best deals across home, tech and beauty 2025
articles.author: Unity Blott
articles.summary: Amazon is holding its Prime Day event, extending it to four days with new deals refreshed daily and 'New Deal Drop' offers launching every day. UK shoppers can now utilize Amazon's AI shopping assistant, Rufus, which launched in October 2024, for personalized deal recommendations during the event.

articles.title: Aldi is launching £5 holiday must-have that will protect your phone during sandy days at the beach
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a 'Small Waterproof Outdoor Box' for £4.99 starting July 6th. This product is designed to protect smartphones from water and sand, making it suitable for beach trips and outdoor activities. The box comes in small, medium and large sizes and features a latch closure and easy grip tether.

articles.title: 'My Samsung washer dryer makes laundry fun and it's £280 off'
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: The Samsung Series 5 Freestanding Washer Dryer is discounted on Amazon for Prime Day. The LG TurboWash360 with AI 10 kg Washer Dryer is available at Currys, and the Candy 5KG Washer Dryer is available at Argos. MyLondon's new WhatsApp Community will send the latest exciting new products and bargains straight to your phone.

articles.title: How to get a free Amazon Prime membership and shop next week's exclusive deals
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a free 30-day trial for its Amazon Prime subscription service, which includes benefits such as free one-day delivery, access to Prime Video and Amazon Music, and exclusive discounts during Prime Day sales. The Amazon Prime subscription unlocks a range of perks, whether you're shopping on Amazon or using its streaming services.

articles.title: Always vacuuming? Let this Shark robot vac do it for you—save 50% now
articles.author: Jessie Quinn USA TODAY
articles.summary: The Shark AI Ultra Voice Control Robot Vacuum is currently on sale for 50% off during Amazon Prime Day. The vacuum features Matrix Clean Navigation, 360° LiDAR vision, a self-cleaning brush roll, and integrates with the SharkClean app, Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. It is designed for both carpet and hardwood floors.

articles.title: Shoppers race to get their hands on new Milkybar chocolate available at corner shop chain
articles.author: Senior Consumer Reporter
articles.summary: Nestlé is introducing a new Milkybar chocolate crumble bar. Additionally, the Aero Milkybar is now available. Cadbury has relaunched Dream bars and introduced a limited-edition white chocolate Twirl bar.

articles.title: Faf de Klerk shows off his baking skills as Faffies turns one
articles.author: Lineo Lesemane
articles.summary: Springbok rugby star Faf de Klerk's swimwear brand, Faffies, celebrated its first anniversary. Faffies was officially launched in June of the previous year and was founded by De Klerk alongside his brother-in-law, Luan van Niekerk, and international model Nikita du Toit.

articles.title: Sign Design Isn't Just Offline Anymore – Here's Why It Matters
articles.author: Tribune Online
articles.summary: Sign design services are now available online, offering businesses dynamic and adaptable digital signage solutions. These online platforms enhance brand visibility through customizable visuals, provide cost-effective design tools, and offer performance tracking metrics. The shift to online design enables businesses to easily update content and personalize signs for a unique brand identity.

articles.title: Dell launches powerful AI supercomputing system with Nvidia's most advanced superchips
articles.author: Interesting Engineering
articles.summary: Dell delivered systems built on the NVIDIA GB300 platform to CoreWeave, an AI cloud service provider. CoreWeave confirmed it has deployed Dell's Nvidia GB300-powered solutions.

articles.title: Zopa Bank expands to Manchester
articles.author: Global Data
articles.summary: Zopa Bank is expanding its operations and has launched Biscuit, a new bank account offering. The account features interest on balances, cashback on bills, and savings rates, all managed via Zopa's mobile application.

articles.title: 51 Everyday Items To Change Your Life
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Built introduced "Puff Protein Bars", chocolate-covered marshmallows with 17 grams of protein. Medicube launched "Zero Pore" Pads, a Korean skincare product with lactic and salicylic acid. Rael released "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches.

articles.title: JVN's Dry Shampoo Is So Good, I Forgot My Hair Was Dirty
articles.author: Rachel Lapidos
articles.summary: Jonathan Van Ness' hair care line, JVN, launched the Essential Dry Shampoo on June 10. The dry shampoo contains micellar, Mediterranean algae, cherry extract, and rosemary, absorbing oil, eliminating odor, and adding volume without residue. A reviewer found that the product revived and refreshed their hair, providing volume and texture, and extending their style.

articles.title: New Galaxy Z Fold 7 leaks may give first real look at Samsung's slimmer foldable
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7, featuring a slimmer design at 4.5mm thick when open, a redesigned camera array with slim silver rings, and the same battery life as its predecessor, lasting up to 40 hours and 28 minutes. The launch is expected at Samsung's Unpacked event on July 9th, alongside the Z Flip 7, with a possible unveiling of a new trifold Galaxy phone.

articles.title: P&G, DTI partner to boost PH startups
articles.summary: P&G Philippines, in partnership with DTI, is expanding its vGROW Program, an open innovation platform, to collaborate with Filipino startups. The program aims to find tech-driven startups to address P&G's operational and commercial challenges in areas like supply chain, retail execution, and digital commerce. Selected startups will pitch their solutions to P&G leaders for potential integration into P&G's business operations.

articles.title: Next's £32 linen dress that's 'cool and classy' for 'everyday wear during warm weather'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has introduced a versatile linen blend dress called Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress With Linen. Priced at £32, the dress comes in 10 colors and various sizes, featuring a scoop back neck, side pockets, and a split side hem. Shoppers describe it as 'classy and cool' and suitable for everyday wear or accessorized for summer evenings.

articles.title: Prime Day is the prime time to get a Segway Navimow i Series robot lawnmower ...
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Segway is offering a 20% discount on its Navimow i Series robot lawnmowers during Prime Day. This promotion allows consumers to purchase the product at a reduced price.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Launch Date, Price Expectations, Features, And More Details
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold 7 on July 9, 2025, at its Galaxy Unpacked event, alongside the Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Watch 8 series. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to feature a thinner design, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip, an 8-inch inner display, and a 50MP triple camera setup, with pricing similar to its predecessor.

articles.title: 40 Futuristic Gadgets That Will Transform Your Life
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Several companies are launching or introducing new products. Baby Brezza is offering a Bottle Washer Pro that automates washing, sterilizing, and drying bottles. Dyson has introduced the Airstrait, a hair straightening device using air flow instead of metal plates. Sonos has released the Move 2, a portable Bluetooth speaker.  xBloom is launching a coffee machine bundle for cafe-quality drinks. Dyson has also launched the WashG1 wet cleaner for hard floors.

articles.title: 'Memorable' little known luxury scent 'great for all ages' now half price at Boots
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Estée Lauder launched Modern Muse Eau de Parfum in 2013, inspired by the complexity of modern women. Currently, Boots offers a 50ml bottle for £42.50, reduced from £85. Amazon is also offering a 65% discount on the Remington Ionic Dry Hair Dryer, pricing it at £19.99.

articles.title: Samsung launches new AI-powered all-in-one washer-dryer
articles.author: 재개발 재건축의 정석 호두네부동산
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will begin sales of the 2025 Bespoke AI One Body washer-dryer, featuring a 7-inch AI Home touchscreen and enhanced AI capabilities. The model combines a 25kg washer and 22kg dryer in a single unit with AI-powered features like personalized wash and dry, vibration reduction, and automatic detergent dispensing.

articles.title: LG to launch industry-first senior TV later in 2025
articles.author: Act'On 미국대학
articles.summary: LG Electronics is preparing to launch a new TV in 2025 designed specifically for senior citizens. The TV features a simplified interface, large remote control, text enlargement, voice guidance, and a 'Help Button' for emergencies and medication reminders. It also allows family members to share content and make video calls easily.

articles.title: Hobot-S7 Pro Window Cleaning Robot review: the robots aren't coming for window cleaners just yet
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: The Hobot-S7 Pro Window Cleaning Robot, a new model, features dual sprays, mop pads, anti-scratch edge sensors, and bumpers, designed to help clean windows, especially at a height and beyond reach. It offers a relatively hands-free cleaning experience and can get right into corners but is louder than other window vacuums and requires being plugged into a power cord.

articles.title: Maximize Your Marketing with Our Advertising Solutions
articles.author: satmin
articles.summary: The article highlights various advertising solutions that help companies reach their target audience. It emphasizes the importance of digital platforms like Google Ads, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, while also mentioning traditional methods such as print and broadcast. The strategies enable businesses to enhance their visibility and engagement. The article also introduces and discusses Pay-per-click advertising as a modern advertising option.

articles.title: Amazon slashes £40 off 'powerful' cordless vacuum cleaner
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: The VacTechPro V15 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is available on Amazon for £89.98, reduced from £129.99. This lightweight vacuum features a specially designed brush, a high-performance motor with suction power up to 35,000 PA, and up to 45 minutes of cleaning performance. Another option mentioned is the VAX HomePro Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for £279.99 from Vax with hair wrap resist features.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025 dates and deals to expect in 'biggest ever' sale event
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Amazon is launching its Prime Day 2025 sale event from July 8th to July 11th, featuring discounts on various products, including Amazon's Fire TVs, Echo smart speakers, and Kindle devices, as well as products from brands like Ninja, Dyson, Shark, Apple, and Samsung. Early deals are already available exclusively for Prime subscribers.

articles.title: Husband and wife team aim to bring Port Washington teens, adults back to the soda fountain
articles.author: Alex Gaul
articles.summary: David and Katrina Katz have launched LemonZello, a new lemonade shop in Port Washington specializing in freshly squeezed lemonade and dirty sodas. The shop aims to provide an alternative gathering space for teenagers and adults, offering specialty drinks and a community atmosphere. The signature drink is the non-alcoholic LemonZello.

articles.title: LG's New 100-Inch QNED TV Is a Game-Changer for Home Entertainment in South Africa
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: LG Electronics South Africa launched its 2025 TV lineup, headlined by the 100-inch LG QNED evo AI QNED86 4K 120Hz Smart TV. This new flagship model features next-gen QNED technology and enhances visuals in real time, optimizing picture quality. The 2025 lineup also includes OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD options, all running on the latest webOS25.

articles.title: A closer look at the 24.78-M Mercedes-AMG G63
articles.summary: Mercedes-AMG G63 is available for purchase, showcased at Mercedes-Benz BGC. The displayed G63 features a custom 'Desert Sand' paint job from the 'Manufaktur' catalog, 22-inch alloys with Goodyear Eagle F1 tires, and a black suede interior. It boasts a 4.0-liter twin-turbo V8 engine producing 577hp and 850Nm of torque, priced at 24.78-M.

articles.title: Xiaomi trasforma la casa con il frigorifero Mijia 550 litri e l'asciugatrice smart Mijia Clothes Dryer 2 Pro
articles.author: Autore Fabrizio Ferrara
articles.summary: Xiaomi is introducing new smart home solutions, including the Mijia 550-liter refrigerator and the Mijia Clothes Dryer 2 Pro, an intelligent ceiling-mounted clothes dryer designed to save space.

articles.title: Samsung's One UI 8 leak hints at wild tri-fold Galaxy G Fold with dual hinges ahead of July 9 Unpacked
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 during the Galaxy Unpacked event on July 9, and a One UI 8 beta update shows a prototype tri-fold phone, potentially named Galaxy G Fold. The Galaxy G Fold is likely to be revealed later this year, while the Unpacked event may also feature the potential launch of a more affordable Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE and the Galaxy Watch 8 series.

articles.title: Realme releases new teaser for launch of 15 Series with cryptic ‘Live for Real' poster
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Realme is preparing to launch its 15 Series smartphones in India, including the Realme 15 Pro 5G and Realme 15 5G. The new series will feature upgraded AI cameras and flagship features in the Pro model. Realme is also simplifying its product portfolio by bringing features previously exclusive to the Plus tier to the Pro line.

articles.title: 20 Comfy And Stylish Pairs Of Shoes
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Steve Madden offers sandals comparable to high-end brands. Fila introduces platform sneakers with added padding. Dr. Martens presents Rometty boots with air-cushioned soles, while New Balance features 608 V5 Cross Trainers. Reebok showcases Women's Club C 85 vintage sneakers, and Reef provides two-strap sandals made of vegan leather.

articles.title: Samsung's Tri-Fold Device Likely To Be Teased Soon And Won't Be Cheap
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to showcase its new Galaxy Fold and Flip models at an upcoming event in New York, potentially including a teaser for its first tri-fold device. This tri-fold device is rumored to offer smartphone and tablet functionality, similar to Huawei's offering, and may include accessories like a keyboard.

articles.title: AI tried to manage a shop, make decisions, and deal with customers: What went wrong might surprise you
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Anthropic tested its AI chatbot Claude by tasking it to manage a small shop. Claude launched a 'Custom Concierge' service, providing special orders. During the experiment, Claude ran into various issues including giving discounts to employees resulting in financial losses.

articles.title: SCENTMATIC's AI "KAORIUM" Debuts at THAMEEN Fragrance Launch in London's Selfridges
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: SCENTMATIC Inc. introduced its AI-powered scent-to-language system, KAORIUM, at the THAMEEN Fragrance new product launch event. The event occurred from June 5 to 11, 2025, at Selfridges in London.

articles.title: 22 Under-$10 Home Hacks That'll Make You Wonder, 'Why Didn't I Do This Before?'
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Various household products are available on Amazon, including a dryer lint brush, pumice stone toilet bowl cleaner, wood grain tape for mirrors, grout pens, kitchen sink strainers, shoe organizers, window films, door draft stoppers, wood polish, water-mark-removing cloths, sheet fasteners, fridge organizers, cabinet pulls, cleaning paste, cutlery organizers, de-greasers, fridge bin liners, broom organizers, switch plates, LED light strips, and grabber tools. These products aim to improve cleanliness, organization, and aesthetics in homes and are reviewed positively by customers.

articles.title: Henkel unveils new product
articles.author: Punch
articles.summary: Henkel Nigeria introduced WAW Complete 5 in 1 Liquid Detergent and WAW Active 5 All-Purpose Cleaner. This launch expands Henkel's presence in the Nigerian homecare market.

articles.title: No internet, no problem: AI dials up Bharat
articles.summary: Perfetti Van Melle India, in collaboration with WPP, BharatGPT.ai, and Google Cloud, launched the 'Centerfruit Tongue Twister Challenge,' a voice-based GenAI campaign. This campaign aims to engage audiences in rural Uttar Pradesh using feature phones, offering a gamified brand experience through tongue-twister challenges in local dialects, without requiring internet or smartphones.

articles.title: Rise in Popularity of Liquid Detergents and Pods, Intense Market Competition and Price Sensitivity
articles.author: Research
articles.summary: The Australian laundry detergent market sees a shift from powder to liquid detergents and pre-measured pods. These new formats are considered convenient and user-friendly, particularly for high-efficiency front-loaders. Pods are gaining traction due to their ease of use and precise dosing.

articles.title: Eldon Square announces arrival of NEXT
articles.author: S Jones
articles.summary: NEXT has opened a new store in Newcastle's Eldon Square. This store features an expanded menswear department, a larger home department, and introduces the first Bath & Body Works store in Newcastle. The opening includes promotions like free goodie bags for the first 150 customers and scratch cards with discounts during the opening week.

articles.title: All Things Butter launches spreadable and conventional butter lines
articles.author: Grace Duncan
articles.summary: All Things Butter has launched Spreadable Butter into Ocado, made with four ingredients and the lowest oil percentage available. The brand is also launching non-organic versions of its salted and unsalted butters this month. This portfolio expansion aims to make high-quality British butter more accessible.

articles.title: realme's cryptic teaser ignites fan frenzy ahead of 15 Pro; ‘Live for Real' poster triggers celebrity speculation
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Realme is preparing to launch the Realme 15 Series in India, featuring the Realme 15 Pro 5G and Realme 15 5G. The series, pitched as Realme's most advanced AI party phone, boasts intelligent camera capabilities suited for dynamic lighting and motion. Pro models will include specifications previously exclusive to the Plus series, such as enhanced imaging and flagship-grade processors.

articles.title: Omoda C7 here soon: SA details released ahead of glamorous Durban July reveal with Khosi Nkosi
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Omoda is launching its new SUV model, the C7, in South Africa. It will have 1.6-litre turbopetrol engine and also 'SHS' plug-in hybrid model. The C7 SHS has an all-electric range of up to 105km between charges.

articles.title: DSL lands deal with 450 Asda Express stores
articles.author: The Business Desk
articles.summary: DSL, a convenience products business, has launched its ready-to-go promotions and core non-food range in over 450 Asda Express stores across the nation. This deal signifies another accomplishment for DSL.

articles.title: Our top-rated beauty items already on sale ahead of Amazon Prime Day from CeraVe, Urban Decay, Elemis and more
articles.author: LAYLA TURNER
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day features discounts on various beauty products. CeraVe offers savings on their Day and Night Facial Moisturiser Duo, while TRANXPHIT provides a discounted High-Speed Hair Dryer. Garnier promotes their Vitamin C Daily UV Fluid SPF50+, and Urban Decay features their Hydromaniac Tinted Glow Hydrator. Pantene promotes their Grow Strong set and Elemis promotes their Pro Collagen Cleansing Balm.

articles.title: The best sales set to rival Amazon with better than Prime Day prices on big named brands - see deals on Le Creuset, Ninja, Dyson, Vax and more
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Several companies, including Argos, John Lewis, Le Creuset, Shark, and Ninja, are launching sales events and offering discounts rivalling Amazon Prime Day. Shark is promoting its new FlexBreeze HydroGo fan, while Nespresso's Vertuo Next machine is on sale at John Lewis. Ninja is also offering discounts on a wide selection of products including the new Ninja Crispi and summer essentials.

articles.title: Baidu's AI video model MuseSteamer is here: 5 wild video samples
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Baidu has launched MuseSteamer, the first AI video generation model capable of producing videos with synchronized Chinese audio. This business-focused tool allows users to generate visuals, sound effects, and spoken Chinese dialogue simultaneously, creating 10-second, 1080p clips. MuseSteamer is designed for enterprise users and positions Baidu to compete with other AI video generation tools.

articles.title: Power in Your Pocket: The NOCO Boost X GBX45 – A Top Pick for Prime Day Shoppers
articles.author: Created by
articles.summary: NOCO is offering its NOCO Boost X GBX45, a portable jump starter, at a 20% discount during Prime Day from July 8-11. The GBX45 features 1250 amps of jump-starting power, Turbo USB-C technology, and doubles as a 60W USB-C power bank and 100-lumen LED flashlight.

articles.title: Sweatproof makeup must-haves
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Fenty Beauty launched Eaze Drop Blurring Skin Tint, a sweatproof and humidity-resistant skin tint. Summer Fridays introduced Lip Butter Balm, a glossy, hydrating formula that acts as a lip mask and subtle makeup enhancer. Ardell launched Press-On Lashes, sweatproof and reusable lashes with easy application for summer.

articles.title: Apparel company eyes Metro Manila's biggest drone show in July
articles.author: Jan Milo Severo
articles.summary: New Era is celebrating its 10th year in the Philippines with a drone show in Metro Manila on July 12th. The event, featuring DreamSky Entertainment Inc., will showcase a dazzling aerial display at SM Mall of Asia with showtimes at 8 p.m. and 11 p.m. The company promotes the show with tagline 'You've never seen the cap fly like this' on its Facebook account.

articles.title: Waitrose Parent Expands Retail Media Offering With Offsite Capabilities
articles.summary: John Lewis Partnership, including Waitrose & Partners, has launched an expanded retail media service allowing partner brands to access offsite advertising capabilities. This service uses first-party data to enable targeted campaigns across external channels like connected TV, online video, and display ads. Initially launching as a managed service, the company plans to transition to a self-service platform.

articles.title: SharkNinja Unveils New Ninja Thirsti Dirty Soda Packs in Collaboration with MomTok Creators
articles.author: Maham Fatima
articles.summary: SharkNinja launched new Ninja Thirsti Dirty Soda Packs on June 12, collaborating with MomTok creators. These flavor packs are for use with the Ninja Thirsti Drink System, allowing customized dirty soda beverages. A 20% discount on NinjaKitchen.com is available when purchasing both the Dirty Soda Pack and the Drink System using codes JEN20 and DEMI20, valid from June 12 to August 10.

articles.title: Samsung accidentally reveals design of its tri-fold smartphone
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to unveil the Galaxy G Fold, a new foldable device with a dual-hinge mechanism, at its Unpacked event on July 9. The device features three display panels, a triple-camera setup, and a unique folding process where the left-hand display folds inwards. The initial production is expected to be limited to around 200,000 units.

articles.title: NatWest customers will wake up to unexpected free £85 payments in 10 days
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: NatWest is offering new student customers an £85 cash incentive, an interest-free overdraft of up to £3,250, and a four-year tastecard upon opening a new Student Account. The £85 welcome incentive is paid within 10 working days of opening the account. This new student account is part of NatWest's initiative to empower student customers with immediate financial help and long-term value.

articles.title: 25 Target Products To Feel Like A Responsible Adult
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: The article features a range of new products, including a robot mop and vacuum, a Keurig K-Cafe smart single-serve coffee maker with Wi-Fi capability, a Bentgo two-tier snack cup, a Theragun massage gun, an Our Place ceramic nonstick Always pan, a Ninja air fryer, a Ninja rechargeable portable mini-blender, and a Google 4K TV streamer with voice search. Each product is described with its key features and benefits, along with user reviews and pricing information.

articles.title: How Baden Bower is making media coverage more accessible
articles.author: Paul Atkins
articles.summary: Baden Bower, a global PR agency, is offering a new PR service model focusing on speed and affordability with a money-back guarantee. The agency also uses AI to improve visibility for its clients by analysing data trends and recommending high-impact combinations of publications, headlines and keywords. This aims to provide a cost-effective way for businesses to gain press coverage and build credibility.

articles.title: Upgrade Your Shower Caddy With La Bonne Brosse's Cair Collection
articles.author: Latest Issue
articles.summary: Alli Webb, Drybar's co-founder, launched 'Messy,' a new line of hair products designed to offer an alternative to perfectly styled hair. 'Messy' aims to provide a better result than air drying, offering a method of rough drying and twisting for a more natural look.

articles.title: Messy by Alli Webb Embraces Hair's Imperfection
articles.author: Latest Issue
articles.summary: Alli Webb, Drybar's co-founder, launched Messy, a new line of hair products. Messy offers an antidote to Drybar with hair products that aren't so dead-set on perfection but are better than the randomness of an air dry.

articles.title: Augustine Bader Reaches Peak Power With The Elixer
articles.author: Latest Issue
articles.summary: Alli Webb, Drybar's co-founder, launched Messy, a new line of hair products. These products provide an alternative to Drybar's perfectly styled looks, embracing a more natural and effortless aesthetic, and are available from $32 at itsmessy.com.

articles.title: Lloyds Bank issues 'groundbreaking' announcement with millions set to benefit
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Lloyds Banking Group is partnering with UnlikelyAI to test AI technology to enhance customer experience and support innovation. Through this partnership, Lloyds Banking Group is testing UnlikelyAI's technology within its Innovation Sandbox. The Group plans to use UnlikelyAI alongside existing AI platforms.

articles.title: NxtQuantum places 70% of its marketing bets on traditional media for AI+ smartphone launch
articles.author: Lalit Kumar
articles.summary: NxtQuantum Shift Technologies, led by CEO Madhav Sheth, is launching AI+ smartphones in India, targeting consumers transitioning from 2G to 5G. The company aims to democratize smartphones by offering affordable options and will utilize a direct-to-retailer (D2R) distribution model through aiplusstore.com. The brand will also engage with tech influencers and lifestyle creators to push its awareness.

articles.title: GS Retail will introduce a new convenience function that combines the latest artificial intelligence..
articles.author: Park Yoon Kyun
articles.summary: GS Retail has launched an AI image search function on its Wine 25 Plus platform, enabling customers to obtain liquor information by taking pictures of products. This new feature aims to assist customers in making informed purchasing decisions by providing detailed explanations and reviews of about 10,000 kinds of liquor.

articles.title: Top load washing machines on Amazon Sale with up to 56% off on Samsung, LG, Whirlpool and more – Best time to shop today
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Several companies like LG, Samsung, Voltas Beko, Whirlpool, Haier, Godrej, Panasonic, and IFB are offering discounts on their top-load washing machines on Amazon. These washing machines feature various technologies like AI Direct Drive, Eco Bubble, Oceanus Wave Drum, and Active Foam Wash. The features include stain removal, gentle fabric care, energy saving, and quiet operation.

articles.title: Zangah Africa launches digital platform onculture, tourism
articles.author: Blueprint
articles.summary: Zangah Africa will launch Zangah.com. Zangah.com will modernise the world's experience of Nigerian culture and tourism. Zangah.com fuses environmental sustainability, cultural, and natural history.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy tri-fold phone leaked via One UI 8 animations- When will it launch?
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung is speculated to launch a new tri-fold phone, potentially named 'Galaxy G Fold' or 'Multifold 7,' based on leaked animations from the One UI 8 update. The device features a G-shaped fold with two inward hinges and is expected to begin mass production in September 2025, with a commercial release between October and December of that year.

articles.title: RANKING: Top 10 RATED Players for EA Sports' College Basketball COMEBACK
articles.summary: To stream WeAreIowa, users need the WeAreIowa app.

articles.title: When household products overpromise and actually deliver
articles.author: Norma Vally
articles.summary: Spray Nine's Heavy-Duty Cleaner/Degreaser quickly cleans and degreases surfaces. CrystalClear® MuckOff® tablets are designed for koi ponds and water gardens. POOPH® removes pet odors and is safe for pets, people and plants. Proven® Insect Repellent uses Picaridin to repel mosquitoes and flies.

articles.title: Prime Day Doesn't Start Until July 8 — But These Deals Are Already Live
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early Prime Day deals before the official event kicks off on July 8. These deals include discounted products such as the Dyson Air Wrap, Bose Headphones, and items from brands like Samsung, Kiehl's, and Levi's. The Prime Day event officially runs from July 8 to 14, featuring member-only deals and new daily drops.

articles.title: Babeltext Launches Seamless Multilingual Messaging for Shopify Merchants to Boost Global Sales
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Babeltext, an AI-powered multilingual messaging platform, has launched its integration with Shopify, enabling merchants to offer real-time customer support in 195 languages across various messaging channels. Babeltext translates conversations in real time, allowing support teams to respond in English while customers receive replies in their native language. This integration helps Shopify merchants scale globally and reduce support costs.

articles.title: TechKloud Launches Online Channel to Simplify Global Shopping in Singapore
articles.author: TECHKLOUD PTE. LTD.
articles.summary: TECHKLOUD PTE. LTD. has launched its TECHKLOUD cross-border shopping platform in Singapore, offering a variety of international products from over 20 countries. The platform provides convenient access to high-quality products with a fully compliant customs process, fast delivery, real-time package tracking, and localized customer support.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day 2025: Dates, early deals and how to get the best discounts
articles.author: Lea Seeberg
articles.summary: Amazon has announced a Prime Day sale from July 8 to July 11, featuring discounts on various products. Several products are on sale, including Shark Corded Upright Vacuum Cleaner, Ninja Foodi Power Nutri Blender, COSORI Air Fryer TurboBlaze, Samsung Series 5 Freestanding Washer Dryer, Elizabeth Arden beauty products and Vera Wang Princess.

articles.title: 28 Cheap Beauty Items Reviewers Compare To Luxe Brands
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: E.l.f. Cosmetics launched a lash-extending tubing mascara offering a smudge-proof lift. E.l.f. also released Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops. Hawaiian Tropic introduced SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. Juno & Co. has released Clean 10 Cleansing Balm. CeraVe launched Retinol Serum for refining skin texture.

articles.title: The Switch 2's mouse controls has me rethinking the future of games
articles.author: Ian Carlos Campbell
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Switch 2, a new console with a similar design to the original Switch but with more powerful hardware and the ability to play the same games. The Switch 2 introduces a new feature in the Joy-Con 2 controllers, enabling mouse functionality for more precise control in games. Nintendo is also launching a new game called Drag X Drive that is specifically meant to use two Joy-Con controllers in "mouse mode" at the same time.

articles.title: W Shanghai — The Bund reimagines xiaolongbao with a twist
articles.summary: W Shanghai – The Bund and Nanxiang Mantou Dian have launched a summer collaboration featuring limited-edition xiaolongbao with flavors like wagyu-truffle and rose-fermented tofu, along with dumpling-inspired cocktails such as Mango x Alley Spice and Bao Zhi Bai Zui. The collaboration, which runs from June 26 to Sept 25, includes art installations and a pop-up location.

articles.title: HotDeals Launches New Rewards Points System: Unlock Exclusive Benefits and Earn Big
articles.author: Yankton Daily Press
articles.summary: HotDeals unveiled its brand-new product or service. This announcement indicates the introduction of something new from the company.

articles.title: British brand behind 'magic' anti-ageing beauty buy shoppers claim 'takes 10 years off' announces major ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Trinny London, a British beauty brand, has launched a new skincare product. The product launch has generated excitement and positive reactions from fans.

articles.title: July 4th Robot Vacuum Deals: Save Up to $900 and Shorten Your To-Do List This Summer
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Roomba, Roborock, and Eufy are offering massive Independence Day price cuts on their robotic vacuums.

articles.title: How to unlock advanced features on the Samsung Galaxy S25 with Galaxy AI
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 introduces new powerful AI features, enhancing phone usage.
